home.name: Emmanuel Munubi
home.tagline: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can. - Arthur Ashe

about.bio: Hi, my name is Emmanuel Munubi. I am a budding software engineer passionate about solving real-world problems with scalable technology. My background includes hands-on experience building web applications, including a browser-based task management system for student interns. I specialize in JavaScript, front-end frameworks, and cloud fundamentals. I’m someone who combines technical know-how with thoughtful system design, aiming to become a systems architect. I bring focus, curiosity, and clarity to projects, which helps streamline collaboration and boost productivity. I'm currently seeking internship or entry-level roles where I can contribute to meaningful tech solutions and grow into a leadership position. I’d appreciate the opportunity to connect with professionals in system architecture or development teams. Thank you for your time and consideration.
about.background: I'm  a Computer Science student in my final year at Pwani University
about.aspirations: In the next five years, I aim to become a proficient Systems Architect.

projects.name: Pwani Innovation Week
projects.description: A website showcasing upcoming events and activities in Pwani Innovation Week.

education.details: python, Django, PostgreSQL, and cloud fundamentals.
